[Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 348 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location).

---
**Heightened (7th)** You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.
